level.heading: Murder in the second degree.
level.text: Whoever with malice aforethought, except as provided in §§ 22-2101, 22- 2102, kills another, is guilty of murder in the second degree. For purposes of imprisonment following revocation of release authorized by § 24- 403.01(b)(7), murder in the second degree is a Class A felony.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 13-302 added the last sentence.
